descriptionlist.description:
Control apps' wireless connectivity policy

This tweak replicates a feature in Chinese iPhone model by using Apple's own private APIs, which effectively writes to /var/preferences/com.apple.networkextension.plist. Either uninstalling this tweak, using the \"Restore\" in Settings, or delete the file (and userspace reboot) will revert all changes made. The file however store some other configurations, like VPN profiles. This tweak works on both iPhone and iPad (Wi-Fi/Cellular).

Features:
  • No tweak hooking

  • Works in non-jailbroken mode

  • Profiles (import/export)

  • CLI tool. "akp -h" for more details


This package tested to be working on iOS 14.3. Might or might not work on lower iOS version.



To support development: https://www.paypal.me/udevs
